Title: Extends the the moratorium on air permit issuance and renewal for certain electric generating facilities
Summary: Extends the moratorium on air permit issuance and renewal for electric generating facilities that utilize a carbon-based fuel and that provide behind-the-meter electric energy consumed or utilized by cryptocurrency mining operations that use proof-of-work authentication methods to validate blockchain transactions.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0331, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to extending the moratorium on air permit issuance and renewal for electric generating facilities that utilize a carbon-based fuel and that provide behind-the-meter electric energy consumed or utilized by cryptocurrency mining operations that use proof-of-work authentication methods to validate blockchain transactions
